text:
You are to generate 100 synthetic Carers data in JSON array format:
[
  {
    "CarerID": "C{i:04d}",
    "ParticipantID": "P{i:04d}",
    "ServiceDate": "2025-07-22",
    "ServiceType": "HomeCare",
    "Duration": 2.5,
    "NarrativeNotes": "Routine check and assistance."
  }
]

This is the final step to get the results of your Carers data. In the example, you're now able to generate this:

[   {

   "CarerID": "C{i:04d}",

   "ParticipantID": "P{i:04d}",

   "ServiceDate": "2025-07-22",

    "ServiceType": "HomeCare",

    "Duration": 2.5,

    "NarrativeNotes": "Routine check and assistance."

}

]

}

This is the final step to get the results of your Carers data. In the example, you're now able to generate this:

[   {

   "CarerID": "C{i:04d}",

   "ParticipantID": "P{i:04d}",

   "ServiceDate": "2025-07-22",

     "ServiceType": "HomeCare",

    "Duration": 2.5,

    "
